title: Prompt & Process Vault
tagline: Personal knowledge vault with AI-powered image analysis
description: A personal productivity tool for organizing prompts, digital assets, and process frameworks. Features automatic image analysis powered by Google Gemini, real-time sync with Firebase, and a clean dashboard interface.

features.name: Dashboard
features.description: Central hub with stats, recent items, and quick actions for all modules

features.name: Prompts Manager
features.description: Organize prompts by category (Coding, Marketing, UI/UX, etc.) with tags and favorites

features.name: Assets Gallery
features.description: Image library with AI-powered automatic analysis - generates title, description, tags, and categorization

features.name: Frameworks Builder
features.description: Create and manage step-by-step process documentation for repeatable workflows

aiHighlight.name: Magic Analysis
aiHighlight.description: Upload any image and Gemini automatically analyzes it to generate a professional title, detailed description, relevant tags, and suggests the best collection category.
